thread.section_title: Snowgoose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snowgoose | snowgoose.com.au
thread.title: Terry

author: Terry
title: Terry
text:
I have only purchased once from SNOWGOOSE a box of Cherries with Mangos, Overall the fruit was excellent and the presentation excellent and the delivery and correspondence was excellent, however for what I paid I was bitterly disappointed in the amount of fruit(cherries in the box with packing taking up most of the space I would rather know before hand that the amount of fruit is a choice rather trhan the disappointment once the box was opened that way I would not feel disappointed for the amount of $$monies spent, there are several ways SNOWGOOSE could improve this either by sending more fruit hence more expense which would either lessen profit or make the item more expensive or change what I think is my second disappointment and that is a really well thought out follow up contact/gift/or whatever at an earlier time from purchase rather than several weeks/months later as my disappointment has festered to the point as I would NOT recommend nor would I deal with SNOWGOOSE again all because once opening the EXCELLENTLY presented gift I was SHOCKED with disappointment from COST versus amount and SIZE of delivery. As I said this is NOT a CRITISICM merely the way I feel and my opinion, I wish SNOWGOOSE all the very best in business as I once had over 500 employees and I would WELCOLME customers opinions and comments
Terry Cooper
